attributes.comment:
Please carefully consider this change and the impact it will have on adoptive
families which I understand are a large percentage of those getting this
document. I understand the need to charge reasonable fees to cover your costs.
However, with the current timelines, those of us who adopt from China often
have to file for these forms twice and pay the fee twice! I would encourage you
to increase the time allowed before these documents must be refiled, but at
least reduce or remove the fee for the renewed documents. This is a huge
financial burden on those of us who adopt children.

I am OK with a reasonable increase in fees to cover costs, but please don't make
us pay it twice, plus increase it so much.

Thank you for listening.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jeannene L. Bragg
